title: Reddit
cleaned_text: Need an idea what to read next? Tell us what you've enjoyed in the past, or what you're looking for, and let the community suggest a book (or books) for you to read! I'm a "take some ginger for a stomachache and clove for a toothache but also get vaccinated and go to the doctor" kind of person. I'd love to find a reference book of herbal remedies for minor ailments but I do not want one that has a super crunchy or
